scripts.deploy-trivia-app-to-firebase: ng build trivia --prod --configuration=dev && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting
scripts.deploy-trivia-admin-app-to-firebase: ng build trivia-admin --prod --configuration=dev && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting
scripts.prod:deploy-trivia-app-to-firebase: ng build  trivia --prod --configuration=production && firebase deploy -P production --only hosting
scripts.prod:deploy-trivia-admin-app-to-firebase: ng build trivia-admin --prod --configuration=production && firebase deploy -P production --only hosting
scripts.compile-ssr-functions: npm run compile-functions && npm run webpack:server && mv dist/index.html functions/dist/index.html
scripts.deploy-trivia-functions-build: npm run build-trivia:ssr && npm run compile-ssr-functions
scripts.deploy-trivia-admin-functions-build: npm run build-trivia-admin:ssr && npm run compile-ssr-functions
scripts.deploy-trivia-functions: npm run deploy-trivia-functions-build && npm run deploy-functions-app && npm run deploy-functions-ssr
scripts.deploy-trivia-admin-functions: npm run deploy-trivia-admin-functions-build && npm run deploy-functions-app && npm run deploy-functions-ssr
scripts.deploy-functions-app: npm run pre-compile-app-functions && firebase deploy -P default --only functions
scripts.deploy-functions-ssr: npm run pre-compile-ssr-functions && firebase deploy -P default --only functions:ssr
scripts.prod:deploy-trivia-functions-build: npm run prod:build-trivia:ssr && npm run compile-ssr-functions
scripts.prod:deploy-trivia-admin-functions-build: npm run prod:build-trivia-admin:ssr && npm run compile-ssr-functions
scripts.prod:deploy-trivia-functions: npm run prod:deploy-trivia-functions-build && npm run prod:set-index && npm run prod:deploy-functions-app && npm run prod:deploy-functions-ssr
scripts.prod:deploy-trivia-admin-functions: npm run prod:deploy-trivia-admin-functions-build && npm run prod:set-index && npm run prod:deploy-functions-app && npm run prod:deploy-functions-ssr
scripts.prod:deploy-functions-app: npm run pre-compile-app-functions && firebase deploy -P production --only functions
scripts.prod:deploy-functions-ssr: npm run pre-compile-ssr-functions && firebase deploy -P production --only functions:ssr
scripts.deploy-functions-local: npm run compile-functions  && firebase serve --only functions
scripts.run-scheduler-dev: npm run compile-scheduler-functions && node scheduler/server/run-scheduler.js dev
scripts.run-scheduler-prod: npm run compile-scheduler-functions && node scheduler/server/run-scheduler.js prod
scripts.build-trivia:ssr: ng build trivia --prod --configuration=dev && ng run trivia:server
scripts.build-trivia-admin:ssr: ng build trivia-admin --prod --configuration=dev && ng run trivia-admin:server
scripts.prod:build-trivia:ssr: ng build trivia --prod --configuration=production && ng run trivia:server
scripts.prod:build-trivia-admin:ssr: ng build trivia-admin --prod --configuration=production && ng run trivia-admin:server
